mapper.select: select t.*,(select c.name from t_catalog c where c.id=t.catalogID) catalogName from t_attribute t where 1=1 and pid=#{pid} and catalogID=#{catalogID} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_attribute t where 1=1 and pid=#{pid} and catalogID=#{catalogID}
select * from t_attribute t where 1=1 and pid=#{pid} and id=#{id} and catalogID=#{catalogID} order by order1
mapper.update: update t_attribute set id=#{id},order1=#{order1} ,name=#{name} ,catalogID=#{catalogID} ,pid=#{pid} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_attribute t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and pid=#{pid} and catalogID=#{catalogID}
select * from t_attribute t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_attribute where 1=1 and id=#{id}
delete from t_attribute where 1=1 and pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_attribute where 1=1 and pid=#{pid} and catalogID=#{catalogID}
